text: Go Set a Watchman is a book by Harper Lee. It was published on July 14, 2015 by HarperCollins in the United States and by Heinemann in the United Kingdom. It is a sequel to Lee's classic book To Kill a Mockingbird. It was written before her published novel, To Kill a Mockingbird. Category:2015 books Category:21st-century American novels Category:To Kill a Mockingbird
title: Go Set a Watchman
